header.title: Disable external links, spam words, non English characters for new users.
header.description: This mod stops spammers, by denying external links, spam words, or non English words, in any post, signature, or profile until a certain number of posts, or days membership has been reached.
header.author-notes: See screenshots and configuration help: http://dangerousprototypes.com/docs/PhpBB3_MOD:_Disable_links_for_new_users Test forum with all spam measures turned off: http://www.skidvd.co.uk/phpbb/index.php

changelog.change: Added code to apply to new user group only (currently must be set in the class source code).
Changed the logging, added admin panel support for some settings.

action-group.diy-instructions: Purge the cache. If the spam hammer settings in the posting section of the general tab throw an error, simply refresh the page. If you want to run the extreme version of the MOD (delete users with spammer-like behavior), edit /includes/functions_link_filter.php and change the value in "private $extreme=false;" to true. More info on the wiki: http://dangerousprototypes.com/docs/PhpBB3_MOD:_Disable_links_for_new_users
